import { useState } from "react" import { BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Link } from "react-router-dom" function Signup() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullname:'', email: '', password: '', confirmpassword: '' }) const [fullname,setFullname]=useState("") const [email,setEmail]=useState function validate(e){ e.preventDefault() if(fullname<6){ alert("Enter name correctly") } else if(password!=confirmpassword){ alert("Password does not match") } else{ alert("Successfully registered..!!") } } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() fetch('http://localhost:3006/users', { method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type' : 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify(formData) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) } function handleChange(e) { setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name] : e.target.value}) } return (
